name: RobotCrashCourse
description:
We found a content blocking bug, that gets rid of half of the game. Please download the latest version here: https://github.com/Jimmy-s-Test-Site/20210204_blitz_jam/releases/tag/1.0

CLICK "CHOOSE YOUR FATE" TO START

Your choices matter, but you don't know how or why. Figure it out!

You are a cyborg who is being experimented on his morality, depending on your choices the scientists will reset you, burn you, or you might even join them

There are 4 endings, for some of them you are gonna have to restart the game

Theme

Choices Matter

Controls
  • Movement: arrows/wasd (space for jump)
  • Shoot: Click
Credits
  • Door: https://oddpotatogift.itch.io/16x16-fantasy-pack
  • Background: https://ansimuz.itch.io/cyberpunk-street-environment
  • Background2: https://ansimuz.itch.io/parallax-forest
  • Background3: https://ansimuz.itch.io/warped-city
  • Player: https://wishforge.itch.io/gdevelop-2d-shooter-platformer-example
  • Mannequin: https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-tiny-hero-sprites-pixel-art
Programmers
  • AubrieMerrell
  • Seijin2008
  • Jaacko Torus
License

MIT

Engine

Godot 3.2.3
